ActNational Capital Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of NORM ODJICK of Maniwaki, Quebec, to be a member of the Board of Directors of the National Capital Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective December 17, 2017.
